name: opencloud
description: OpenCloud is a self-hosted private cloud solution that provides file storage, collaborative editors, email, chat, and more through a browser-based interface, similar to Nextcloud.

features.title: Team Collaboration
features.description: Upload, organize, and share files with folder structures and permission controls for team collaboration

features.title: Document Editing
features.description: Collaborate on documents, spreadsheets, and presentations using integrated office suite compatibility

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Manage schedules and address books with CalDAV and CardDAV sync to mobile devices

features.title: Email Integration
features.description: Access email accounts through webmail interface with IMAP support for unified communication

features.title: Chat And Video
features.description: Communicate with team members using built-in messaging and video conferencing capabilities

features.title: Mobile Sync
features.description: Access files and data from iOS and Android devices with native apps for offline availability

features.title: External Storage
features.description: Connect to S3, FTP, and other storage backends to unify access across multiple systems
